--------------------------------------------------------------------------
                     .=============================.
                     |      Command & Conquer      |
                     |     RED ALERT 2  FRENCH     |
                     .=============================.


  This version is ready to play online.

This installer contains :
  - The latest version of the game, 1.006, integrally in French ;
  - A No-CD patch so that you won't need any CD-ROM to play ;
  - The data of both the Allied and the Soviet CD-ROMs (maps and movies
    .mix files), including mission cutscenes (in French) ;
  - 20 tested CD-Keys, of which one will be randomly installed.

The source for the installer (included) is a modification by Caerbannog
of code by Olaf van der Spek.


Notice : To play online you just have to login with a new username ; the
  game registration system is not needed anymore.


  Have fun with this wonderful game from Westwood Studios !
